CustomField.formula: TEXT(Solicitor_1__c) = SUBSTITUTE($User.FirstName, " ", "\\") + " " + SUBSTITUTE($User.LastName, " ", "\\") || TEXT(Solicitor_2__c) = SUBSTITUTE($User.FirstName, " ", "\\") + " " + SUBSTITUTE($User.LastName, " ", "\\") || TEXT(Solicitor_3__c) = SUBSTITUTE($User.FirstName, " ", "\\") + " " + SUBSTITUTE($User.LastName, " ", "\\") || TEXT(Solicitor_4__c) = SUBSTITUTE($User.FirstName, " ", "\\") + " " + SUBSTITUTE($User.LastName, " ", "\\") || TEXT(Solicitor_5__c) = SUBSTITUTE($User.FirstName, " ", "\\") + " " + SUBSTITUTE($User.LastName, " ", "\\")
CustomField.label: EDF Participant is Current User
